messages.title: TAKE BACK CONTROL OF OUR COUNTRY
UKIP WORKS FOR YOU NOT FOR THE EU

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP will ensure that the UK keeps VAT revenues
We will put a 5 year freeze on immigration for unskilled workers
UKIP will increase personal care in the NHS
UKIP will protect the green belt
UKIP will defend Brexit against those who wish to overturn the result
UKIP will abolish the House of Lords and replace it with an elected chamber
